document_data.name: Speak With Birds
document_data.mainbody: '''''Speak with birds''''' was a [[Divine magic|divine]] [[alteration]] [[spell]] used only by specialty priests devoted to [[Thoth]] called [[Scrivener]]s.
document_data.Effects: With this spell a Scrivener could understand and communicate with any normal or giant bird possessing animal intelligence. The cooperation of the bird was not guaranteed, but the priest was able to ask questions and receive answers. The quality of answers provided by the bird depended on their general nature and intelligence.<ref name="PaP-p132/>
document_data.Components: This spell required only [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s to cast.
